txt.en:
'When we came here, we thought the only trouble that we would have in these tombs would be a few robbers and then making sure the walls did not come down upon us. 

'No-one foresaw the kergrim, whatever they are. All I know is that they are vicious carrion feeders that will sooner kill you than look at you.

'A group of them have taken to living within Haudh Valandur. That is a problem I need you to rectify.'
'So it is safe to venture within then?'
'I have no words of advice beyond strike them first and strike them hard.'
Haudh Valandur has become home to a group of kergrim, foul creatures of unknown origin.
Haudh Valandur is within the Way of Kings, west of the Ranger-camp.\n\nMaladan asked you to go to Haudh Valandur and defeat the kergrim found within.
Talk to Maladan in the Way of Kings
Maladan is at the Ranger-camp in the Way of Kings.\n\nMaladan will be pleased to hear that you survived the kergrim of Haudh Valandur.
